about_the_game:
Immerse yourself in a haunting journey across a decimated England in END LAND, a third-person narrative-driven zombie action-adventure shooter.

Coming to PC, this single-player experience combines combat, atmospheric storytelling, and a powerful soundtrack to create a harrowing tale of survival, sacrifice, and the will to keep moving forward.

Story Overview:

After a devastating military strike leaves England in chaos, Alex, a battle-hardened ex-soldier, finds himself stranded on a remote island off the north east coast of the country.

Determined to reunite with his wife in London, he must travel through a landscape ravaged by destruction and infected by a mysterious virus that has turned people into relentless, flesh-hungry zombies.

As Alex battles both human survivors and the infected, he unravels the truth behind the outbreak—and faces the dark secrets that come with it.

Alex’s cynicism and combat training shape his journey, but the people he meets and the horrors he witnesses along the way test even his hard resolve. Can he make it home, or will the weight of what he discovers change his path forever?

Diverse & Dangerous Combat:

Face off against the infected and desperate human adversaries. Utilise Alex’s military training to survive brutal encounters, mixing melee attacks with a range of firearms. Manage your resources carefully—ammo and supplies are scarce, and each encounter is a fight for survival.

Atmospheric Storytelling:

END LAND places heavy emphasis on its dark, emotional narrative. Explore the ruins of a broken nation as you uncover the mystery behind the virus and its origins. Every location tells a story as Alex finds remnants left by the survivors of the outbreak.

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence, General Mature Content.

name: END LAND

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K@3.3GHz or AMD FX 6300@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 (3 GB) or AMD Radeon R9 290 (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K@3.5GHz or Ryzen 5 1500X@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 (6 GB) or AMD Radeon RX 580 (8 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 30 MB available space

short_description: Stranded on a remote island after a devastating military attack, Alex must fight his way through a zombie-infested England to reach his wife in London. Uncover the secrets behind the deadly virus, survive brutal encounters, and face a nation in chaos in this story-driven action adventure game.
